description:
While the Detective Boys excitedly discuss soccer on the way home from school, Conan is thinking about a different news story. Missing professional shogi player Nishikido, who was suspected of matching fixing, was murdered and found dead. At the crime scene was a shogi board with one leg cut off. The kids are discussing the origin of the term "yaocho" (match fixing) featured in the article Conan was reading when Haneda Shukichi shows up. Shukichi explains that he played against Nishikido and describes his impression of the man. The Detective Boys notice Shukichi is neatly dressed and believe he`s going on a date with his girlfriend Yumi, but Shukichi denies it, saying he`s meeting someone important instead, and leaves. Soon afterwards, Yumi shows up following Shukichi, as she finds his behavior suspicious. Claiming he`s less likely to notice she`s following him if she has a child with her, Yumi drags Conan off with her. Conan and Yumi follow Shukichi and witness him buying a bunch of donuts and having a friendly conversation with a couple of women...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le plateau de shôgi de Taikô Meijin (1er coup)
太閤名人の将棋盤 (初手編)
